text: María Cecilia Morel Montes (born January 14, 1954) is the widow of the former President of Chile Sebastián Piñera. She was the First Lady of Chile from 2018 until 2022. She was also the Sociocultural Area Director of the Presidency during her husband's first presidency between 2010 until 2014. ==Honours== *: ** Grand Cross of the Royal Norwegian Order of Merit (27 March 2019) *: ** Dame Grand Cross of the Order of Isabella the Catholic (4 March 2011)Boletín Oficial del Estado ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:First Ladies of Chile
title: Cecilia Morel
